pkgmetadata.longdescription:
eVorbisPlayer is an OggVorbis audio player which requires the Xiph Ogg Suite of libraries
Q: Why another damned audio player? A: -> The purpose of eVorbisPlayer has always been to be used as a vehicle by which to better learn the EFL componants. And audio player was choosen because it's interesting, the OggVorbis API is very simple and can easily drawn on Ecore's strengths (ie: idlers and timers) and provides a number of interesting interface possibilities. The intension has never been, and probly never will be, to build a robust, functional and flexable audio player.
